contest-event.event-date:
May 1, 1994 D Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (Championship Section)
Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (Championship Section) 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest yorkshire-humberside-bba-contest
Riley Smith Hall, Tadcaster, North Yorkshire, England, UK March contest - 1st Wakefield, 2nd British Steel, 3rd Jayess. Hymn tune contest - 1st British Steel, 2nd Wakefield, 3rd York Railway. 36th annual contest. 7 bands competed.
Dec. 13, 2011, 1:55 p.m. Aug. 27, 2014, 12:50 p.m.
1 York Railway Institute Mark Sidwell
2 Wakefield Metropolitan Band Stephen Wood
3 British Steel Teesside John Roberts
4 Jayess (Queensbury) Band Jim Shepherd
5 Yorkshire Evening Post Band David Essex
6 South Milford Brass Nigel Horne
7 Kirkbymoorside Town Band John Woodward
Withdrawn Barnsley Brass Brian Dyson
Withdrawn Yorkshire Traction John Hudson
